# Test SSE/live reload functionality

# Start server with live reload
md2html -http :9003 live.md &
sleep 1s

# Test raw markdown endpoint
curl -s http://localhost:9003/
stdout 'Live Reload Test'

# Test that SSE endpoint exists and responds
curl -s -I --max-time 1 http://localhost:9003/events
stdout 'HTTP/1.1 200'

# Clean up background process
wait
